names.name: Adonai Melekh
names.description: The Divine Name associated with Malkuth, emphasizing God's rulership and the manifestation of His kingdom in the material world.

names.name: Sandalphon
names.description: The Archangel associated with the power to turn prayer into reality, grounding divine energy into the material plane.

names.name: Ashim
names.description: The order of angels associated with Malkuth, representing the transformation and the ascension of the soul through the physical experience.

names.name: Earth
names.description: The element associated with Malkuth, representing physicality, reality, and the tangible universe.

names.name: Shekhinah
names.description: Symbolizes the indwelling presence of God in the world, the divine spark within all matter.

names.name: The Bride
names.description: Embodies the receptivity of the divine influence, often personified as the bride in the divine marriage of the sefirot.
